languages.text: "С начала вахты, сразу как передала тело в ведение Кляйна. Отлучилась я лишь однажды, чтобы забрать свою {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g} из личной каюты. Я оставила часового, но он... пропал. Вероятно, кто-то из офицеров в сумятице не разобрался, что он на посту, и погнал его с заданием... Но меня не было всего несколько минут!"

"Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"
languages.original_text: "С начала вахты, сразу как передала тело в ведение Кляйна. Отлучилась я лишь однажды, чтобы забрать свою {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}инфопластину{/g} из личной каюты. Я оставила часового, но он... пропал. Вероятно, кто-то из офицеров в сумятице не разобрался, что он на посту, и погнал его с заданием... Но меня не было всего несколько минут!"

traits.locale_text: "I have been on watch since I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the data-slate from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Apparently, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on an errand in his confusion... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: "When I arrived to investigate the cogitator, its spirit was already enraged. I will check the door access record." {n}Jinevra taps on her data-slate.{/n} "Hrotko, you entered the room even before Androveta-Phi and I. What were you doing there?"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: "I have been on watch since I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the data-slate from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Apparently, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: "I have been on watch since I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the data-slate from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Apparently, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: "Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: "I have been on watch since I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the data-slate from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Apparently, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on an errand in his confusion... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: "Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the data-slate from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: "Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

languages.text: « Oui, madame, depuis le début du quart. Je me suis rendue sur place après avoir confié le cadavre à la garde de Klein. Je ne me suis absentée qu'une seule fois, quand je suis allée chercher la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g} dans mes quartiers. J'avais chargé un vigile de monter la garde, mais à mon retour, il avait disparu. Selon toute vraisemblance, l'un des officiers a dû faire appel à lui sans savoir qu'il était déjà occupé... Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est à peine si je suis partie quelques minutes ! »
languages.original_text: "Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"

traits.locale_text: « Oui, madame, depuis le début du quart. Je me suis rendue sur place après avoir confié le cadavre à la garde de Klein. Je ne me suis absentée qu'une seule fois, quand je suis allée chercher la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}plaque de données{/g} dans mes quartiers. J'avais chargé un vigile de monter la garde, mais à mon retour, il avait disparu. Selon toute vraisemblance, l'un des officiers a dû faire appel à lui sans savoir qu'il était déjà occupé... Quoi qu'il en soit, c'est à peine si je suis partie quelques minutes ! »
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: « L'esprit était déjà déchaîné quand je suis arrivée pour inspecter le cogitateur. Un petit instant, le temps que je consulte le registre d'accès... » {n}Jinevra tapote sur sa plaque de données.{/n} « Hrotko, vous êtes entré dans la pièce avant Androveta-Phi et moi-même. Peut-on savoir ce que vous faisiez là-bas ? »
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

languages.text: «Sí, señora, desde que empezó la guardia. Vine aquí inmediatamente después de entregar el cuerpo a Klein. El único momento en el que estuve ausente fue cuando fui a recuperar la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} de mis aposentos. Dejé a un vigilante, pero ha desaparecido. Probablemente algún oficial no se fijó en que estaba trabajando y le encargó algo... ¡Pero solo falté unos minutos!».
languages.original_text: "Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"

traits.locale_text: «Sí, señora, desde que empezó la guardia. Vine aquí inmediatamente después de entregar el cuerpo a Klein. El único momento en el que estuve ausente fue cuando fui a recuperar la {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}tablilla de datos{/g} de mis aposentos. Dejé a un vigilante, pero ha desaparecido. Probablemente algún oficial no se fijó en que estaba trabajando y le encargó algo... ¡Pero solo falté unos minutos!».
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: «Cuando llegué para investigar el cogitador, su espíritu ya estaba enfurecido. Comprobaré el registro de acceso de la puerta». {n}Jinevra toca su tablilla de datos.{/n} «Hrotko, usted entró a la sala incluso antes que Androveta-Phi y yo. ¿Qué hacía allí?».
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

languages.text: “是的，长官，从这一巡开始就是这样。我让克莱因负责看守尸体，之后就立刻赶了过去。期间我只离开过一次，回到房间里拿{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}。我当时留了个人在那边看守，但我回去的时候，那个人已经不见了。可能是别的什么军官不知道他在那里执勤，就打发他去干别的事情了……但我只离开了几分钟而已！”
languages.original_text: "Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"

traits.locale_text: “是的，长官，从这一巡开始就是这样。我让克莱因负责看守尸体，之后就立刻赶了过去。期间我只离开过一次，回到房间里拿{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}数据板{/g}。我当时留了个人在那边看守，但我回去的时候，那个人已经不见了。可能是别的什么军官不知道他在那里执勤，就打发他去干别的事情了……但我只离开了几分钟而已！”
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: “当我赶到现场，调查沉思者的时候，它的机魂已经被激怒了。我可以去查一下门禁记录。”{n}杰尼娃敲了敲她的数据板。{/n}“赫洛卡，我和安多维塔-菲进入房间之前你就已经进去了。你当时在里面干什么呢？”
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

languages.text: 「はい、ウォッチ開始時からです。そこにはクラインに死体を引き渡した直後に行きました。そこから離れたのは、宿舎に{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}を取りに行った時だけです。見張りを一人残したのですが、彼は行方不明になりました。おそらく、士官の誰かが、彼が仕事中であることを知らず、何かの用事でどこかに行かせたのでしょう…ですが、私が席を外したのはほんの数分のことです！」
languages.original_text: "Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"

traits.locale_text: 「はい、ウォッチ開始時からです。そこにはクラインに死体を引き渡した直後に行きました。そこから離れたのは、宿舎に{g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}データスレート{/g}を取りに行った時だけです。見張りを一人残したのですが、彼は行方不明になりました。おそらく、士官の誰かが、彼が仕事中であることを知らず、何かの用事でどこかに行かせたのでしょう…ですが、私が席を外したのはほんの数分のことです！」
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: 「コジテーターの調査をするために到着した際、精霊は既に怒り狂っていました。ドアへのアクセス記録をチェックしましょう」 {n}ジネブラはデータスレートを叩いた。 {/n}「フロトコ、あなたは私とアンドロベタ・ファイよりも前に部屋に入っていたが、そこで何をやっていたんだ？」
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

languages.text: "Ja, Ma'am, seit Schichtbeginn. Ich bin sofort hin, nachdem ich Klein die Leiche übergeben hatte. Ich war nur kurz weg, um den {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datablock{/g} aus meinem Quartier zu holen. Ich ließ einen Wachmann zurück, aber er ist verschwunden. Vermutlich hat einer der Offiziere nicht erkannt, dass er im Dienst war und ihn auf irgendeinen Botengang geschickt ... Dabei war ich nur ein paar Minuten weg!"
languages.original_text: "Yes, ma'am, since the start of the watch. I went there right after I handed the body over to Klein. The only time I stepped away was to retrieve the {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}data-slate{/g} from my quarters. I left a watchman, but he went missing. Most likely, one of the officers did not realise he was on duty and sent him off on some errand... But I was only gone for a few minutes!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Ma'am, seit Schichtbeginn. Ich bin sofort hin, nachdem ich Klein die Leiche übergeben hatte. Ich war nur kurz weg, um den {g|Encyclopedia:Dataslate}Datablock{/g} aus meinem Quartier zu holen. Ich ließ einen Wachmann zurück, aber er ist verschwunden. Vermutlich hat einer der Offiziere nicht erkannt, dass er im Dienst war und ihn auf irgendeinen Botengang geschickt ... Dabei war ich nur ein paar Minuten weg!"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2

traits.locale_text: "Als ich eingetroffen bin, um den Cogitator zu verhören, war dessen Geist bereits erzürnt. Ich überprüfe die Zugangsprotokolle der Tür." {n}Jinevra tippt auf ihrem Datablock herum.{/n} "Hrotko, Ihr habt den Raum noch vor Androveta-Phi und mir betreten. Was habt Ihr dort getan?"
traits.speaker: EnforcerDetective2
